system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Axes)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.MTbNQ0q4AensGsif]{Axe Martial Arts}

Benefits

When wielding a battle-axe, broadaxe, or hand axe, the character gains an additional +1 damage die, and the character gains a +2 bonus to all attacks.
